channel.title: Data on Cornell RPAL
channel.description: Recent content in Data on Cornell RPAL

item.title: Situated Gesture and Speech
item.description: As a part of our work on unfamiliar gesture recognition, we encountered a need for a large, high-quality dataset of situated gesture and speech — gestures and speech used at the same time by the same person to describe the same things. Such a dataset is central to our approach to zero-shot learning for gesture understanding (Thomason and Knepper, 2016). As we were unable to find a large dataset of this type, we collected this dataset during 2016 and 2017.
